name: Guttula (LD 44)
description:
Help a little water droplet traverse the dry desert to find its way home.

THE GAME

Help a little water droplet [Guttula] traverse the desert to find its way back home, but be careful – the desert is dry and every step you take costs you your life.

Along the way there are springs that can replenish you, but also bugs and plants that want your essence.

Being selfless and helping the desert bloom gains you mana, but at what cost?

HOW TO PLAY

Find your way through the maze to the main spring

WASD or arrow keys to move

Every step takes water

You can touch cacti to make them bloom, but it takes water

Watch out for the spiders!

DEV NOTES

Made from scratch using Unity, Pyxel Edit, BeepBox, Bfxr, and Audacity.

I’m tired, hungry, thirsty, and I need a shower – but I did it!!
